content: Never thought of it that way actually. I always try to manage my time. But, attention is what I lose with the many distractions. Although I’ve been reducing my distractions, I still need to practice maintaining focus. I’ve found that after a small win, I purposely look for the distraction. I reach out to my phone and see if anything new has happened. The good thing is that I’m aware of this and I’m actively trying to be better. Thanks again for the eye opener Darius Foroux
